|description    = A gramophone found often in venues such as the [[Palais Mermonia]], used to help employees relax and improve their working state. Capable of storing sound for long periods, it faithfully reproduces music with great clarity. Given the high expense of the sound storage medium and the potential for wear and tear after repeated use, music is not played continuously. '''"Maison Cardinalice's Musical Tone"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Maison Cardinalice's Musical Tone" is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=90}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 16h
|Iron Chunk = 8
|White Iron Chunk = 4
|sort = Iron Chunk;White Iron Chunk
}}
